ComicInfo.Penciller: Eduardo Barreto,Marshall Rogers,Paris Cullins,Eduardo Barreto,Marshall Rogers
ComicInfo.Title: Tempest Toss'd!; A Boy & His Hukka
ComicInfo.Summary:
Tempest Toss'd!: Tempest rejoins the rest of the crew on Scanner One and Blackjak pilots them back to New Earth.
A Boy & His Hukka: A young Chris Champion accidentally leaves Hukka behind in a toy store when it closes and Hukka must avoid the guard dog until Chris realizes and returns for his pet.
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
